definition: branches and knots/fig. side issue/minor peripheral problem
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Unemployment is one of the major problem of modern times.
sentences.chinese: 让我们略过这些枝节来谈主要问题吧。

sentences.english: Don't digress from the subject when lecturing.
sentences.chinese: 讲课时不要扯到枝节上。

sentences.english: He doesn't come near to touching the main point, but shies away into side issues.
sentences.chinese: 他不去触及要点，却扯到枝节问题上去了。

sentences.english: His squeaky voice came from beyond the tangle of saplings and laurel.
sentences.chinese: 在枝节缠绕的月桂树丛的对面，传来了他尖促的声音。

sentences.english: Let's skip over these details and come to the main point.
sentences.chinese: 让我们略过这些枝节来谈主要问题吧。

sentences.english: is all about choices. When you cut away all the junk, every situation is a choice.
sentences.chinese: 每件事物剔除一切枝节后剩下的都是一种选择。

sentences.english: It isn't worthwhile spending so much time on minor problems.
sentences.chinese: 在枝节问题上犯不着花这么多时间。
不要把时间浪费在枝节事情上。

sentences.english: There is no need to worry over such a side-issue.
sentences.chinese: 没有必要为这样的枝节问题发愁了。

sentences.english: The Cambodian issue is very definitely a side issue.
sentences.chinese: 柬埔寨问题肯定只是一个枝节问题。

sentences.english: We can tie up loose ends on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在星期五处理枝节问题。

sentences.english: Not yet, but that's fairly irrelevant now.
sentences.chinese: 还没有，但现在那是相当枝节的问题。

sentences.english: He does not come near to touching the main point, but shies away into side issues.
sentences.chinese: 他不去触及要点，却扯到枝节问题上去了。

definition: branches and tendrils/fig. overcomplicated or digressive
a new branch grows out of a knot (idiom); fig. side issues keep arising
the whys and the wherefores/the detailed story/root cause
